daemon_error.message: Please check the WSRX log and report the issue.
daemon_error.title: WSRX Daemon Error

daemon_offline.message: WSRX daemon is offline. Please ensure it's running.
daemon_offline.title: WSRX Daemon Offline

daemon_unavailable.message: WSRX daemon is not running. If the desktop client is active, check the control address in platform settings.
daemon_unavailable.title: WSRX Daemon Unavailable

error.unknown: An unknown error occurred while accessing the WSRX API.

version_mismatch.message: WSRX version is outdated. Please update before using platform integration.
version_mismatch.title: Version Mismatch
